feed.title: WeddingShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.1
entry.content:
Added

  • Added the ability to take images directly from the upload area using the GALLERY_CAMERA_UPLOADS environment variable.
  • Added the ability to download item groups.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.0.2...1.6.1

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.2
entry.content:
Added

  • Added the new custom resources tab as well as selecting banners from uploaded resource files.
  • Added directory scanner task to inject existing custom resources into the database so they show on site.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.1...1.6.2

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.3
entry.content:
Added

  • Added gallery override popup to allow admins to override the default gallery settings from each gallery page.

Fixed

  • Fixed a bug on the directory scanner for custom resources that was allowing the same resource to be re-added multiple times.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.2...1.6.3

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.4
entry.content:
Added

  • Added audit logs to help track user usage and bad actors on shared accounts.
  • Added the ability to freeze a users account with auto logout every 60 seconds to ensure any live sessions are ended.
  • Added IP address to failed login attempt logs.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.3...1.6.4

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.5
entry.content:
Added

  • Added the GALLERY_QR_CODE_INCLUDE_CULTURE environment variable to allow users to include/exclude the culture settings in the QR code.
  • Added the sponsors badge to give the people that help fund this project some credit.

Changed

  • Updated to a new logo that is not owned by a third party.

Removed

  • Removed the footer attribution for Freepik - Flaticon as the logo is no longer used.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.4...1.6.5
